name: Type (of state)
xml:
<field
	type="list"
	name="type"
	label="Type"
	description="Select the Type"
	message="Error! Please add the Type here."
	class="list_class"
	layout="joomla.form.field.list-fancy-select"
	multiple="false"
	option="department|Department,district|District,region|Region,province|Province,municipality|Municipality,geographical region|Geographical Region,popularate|Popularate,oblast|Oblast,city|City,land|Land,county|County,governorate|Governorate,administered area|Administered Area,federal capital territory|Federal Capital Territory,emirate|Emirate,special municipality|Special Municipality,state|State,metropolitan administration|Metropolitan Administration,parish|Parish,metropolitan city|Metropolitan City,special self-governing province|Special Self-Governing Province,special self-governing city|Special Self-Governing City,dependency|Dependency,territory|Territory,division|Division,island council|Island Council,special city|Special City,union territory|Union Territory,autonomous territorial unit|Autonomous Territorial Unit,overseas collectivity|Overseas Collectivity,metropolitan region|Metropolitan Region,metropolitan collectivity with special status|Metropolitan Collectivity with Special Status,overseas region|Overseas Region,autonomous region|Autonomous Region,administrative region|Administrative Region,capital district|Capital District,prefecture|Prefecture,canton|Canton,metropolitan department|Metropolitan Department,overseas territory|Overseas Territory,island|Island,autonomous community|Autonomous Community,autonomous city|Autonomous City,village|Village,sheadings|Sheadings,capital city|Capital City,district municipality|District Municipality
"
/>
